Gustav Landauer (7 Eprel 1870 2 Mee 1919) bụ otu n'ime ndị isi na-akụzi ihe gbasara anarchism na Germany na ngwụcha nke iri na itenanị na mmalite nke narị afọ nke iri abụọ Ọ bụ onye na-akwado anarchism nke mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya na onye na-eme udo.
N'afọ 1919, ọ bụ Kọmishọna nke Enlightenment na Public Instruction nke Bavarian Soviet Republic nke dị mkpirikpi n'oge German Revolution nke 1918- 1910 E gburu ya mgbe a kwaturu mba a.
A makwaara Landauer maka ọmụmụ ya banyere metaphysics na okpukpe, na nsụgharị ya nke ọrụ William Shakespeare n'asụsụ German.
Landauer bụ nwa nke abụọ nke nne na nna ndị Juu Rosa née Neuberger na Herman Landauer. Ọ kwadoro anarchism site na 1890s

N'afọ ndị ahụ, ọ na-anụ ọkụ n'obi karịsịa banyere ụzọ Max Stirner na Friedrich Nietzsche si eme ihe n'otu n'otu, kamakwa "na-adọ aka ná ntị megide apotheosis nke onye a na-ejighị n'aka, nke nwere ike iduga n'ileghara ịdị n'otu anya".

Ya na Martin Buber bụ ezigbo enyi, na-emetụta nkà ihe ọmụma nke mkparịta ụka nke Martin Buber. Landauer kwenyere na a pụghị inweta mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya naanị site na njikwa nke steeti ma ọ bụ ngwá ọrụ akụ na ụba, mana ọ chọrọ mgbanwe na mmekọrịta mmadụ na mmadụ.

O chere na ezi ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya nwere ike ibilite naanị na njikọ nke mgbanwe mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya, o dekwara, "Obodo anyị na-achọsi ike ma chọọ, anyị ga-ahụ naanị ma ọ bụrụ na anyị kewapụ onwe anyị na ịdị adị nke onwe anyị; ya mere anyị ga-emesị chọta, n'ime etiti ma ọ bụ ihe anyị zoro ezo, obodo kachasị ochie na nke zuru ụwa ọnụ: agbụrụ mmadụ na cosmos".
Otu n'ime ụmụ ụmụ Landauer, ya na nwunye ya na onye edemede Hedwig Lachmann, bụ Mike Nichols, onye nduzi telivishọn America, ihe nkiri na ihe nkiri, onye edemede, na onye na-emepụta ihe.
